content.question: Which of the following is true according to the diagram?

choices.label: The Senate minority leader is as powerful as the Senate majority whip.
The Speaker of the House, in coordination with the House majority leader, appoints the House minority leader.
Unlike the House of Representatives, the Senate does not recognize political parties.
Both chambers make use of a system of majority and minority whips.

content.answer: Both chambers make use of a system of majority and minority whips.
